name: mohsinraza2/magento-cache-warmer
description: Magento 2 CacheWarmer module that proactively warms product, category, and CMS pages to improve performance, page speed, and SEO rankings.

suggest.ext-curl: Required for making HTTP requests to warm cache.
suggest.ext-json: Required for handling JSON responses and configurations.
suggest.ext-mbstring: Required for multibyte string operations in Magento.
suggest.ext-intl: Recommended for internationalization and localization support.
suggest.ext-gd: Recommended for image processing and resizing.
